title: Could we get an option that allows us to use the Classic ranked champion select theme from S1-4?
body:
Since we have an option to use the Classic version of the Summoner's Rift theme, could we get this option for the ranked champion select theme as well?

Old ranked music here for people who don't remember:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WIOh512j8XM

replies.body: It was a great piece of music.

Yeah, it was one of my favorites, that and old Dominion Champ select. I was sad to see (hear?) it go. 

I used to consider the old Champion Select theme to be League of Legends theme song. Sort of weird when they completely eliminated it from the game. A solid, recognizable theme is a great asset for a game.
Pfft. I posted this days ago. Nobody wanted to listen to it. Made me sad.

> [{quoted}](name=Weathered,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=a0AAAYy4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T12:39:25.447+0000)
>
> There's an option for the old summoner's rift? I just assumed you had to use a custom skin, which is risky and can get you punished for tampering with files.


 Yep. It's at the very bottom of the in-game sound settings.
There's an option for the old summoner's rift? I just assumed you had to use a custom skin, which is risky and can get you punished for tampering with files.

> [{quoted}](name=Weathered,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=a0AAAYy4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T12:39:25.447+0000)
>
> There's an option for the old summoner's rift? I just assumed you had to use a custom skin, which is risky and can get you punished for tampering with files.

As long as you don't give yourself an advantage, you can't get punished for that.

I really hope we see the return of this theme sometime soon (as well as having this theme return as an optional ranked draft theme). While the theme was overused in the past - it's definitely a very iconic theme to the game itself and really should be represented somewhere in the game regardless. 

Like others, I too view this theme to being the theme song of League of Legends as well. Incredibly powerful.
